ModMetaData.name: Animal Armor Vanilla [OGSN]
ModMetaData.author: Oh God Spiders No
ModMetaData.description:
<color=orange>Requires at least HugsLib 5.0.0 and Animal Gear 0.9.0</color>\n
Version 1.0.0
Requires HugsLib and Animal Gear.
Armor for all of your animal warriors.
The goal of this mod is to: - Add armor for all vanilla game combat animals - Split the "Animal Gear: Basic" and "Rhino Armor" armors up by body part - Add pieces to cover more body parts
This mod includes/replaces all the art assets from: - Animal Gear: Basic - Rhino Armor
(Loading those will create duplicate items)
